description: Long-term extension, beyond 2100,  for the SSP5-8.5 scenario.   Emissions are reduced linearly starting in 2100 to less than 10 GtCO2/yr in 2250, a level that is estimated to produce equilibrated radiative forcing at a high level (around 14 W/m2) over the period 2200-2300. Concentration-driven.
keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP8.5 extension, SSP-based RCP
long_name: extension of RCP8.5 based on SSP5
rationale: To investigate long term changes associated with a high forcing scenario. To allow investigation of questions related to climate change beyond 2100. To address questions of long term feedbacks and reversibility which might not be apparent from shorter simulations.
